WHAT IS IT?

It's a nifty new web tool, designed to make your election vote count.

Voting can be difficult, but it shouldn't be a chore. It's a rare chance to be an individual, to express yourself and your values.

It's election day! How exciting! The sheep's a bit tied up at the moment but we'll let him loose again after 7pm, so stay tuned!
